author: dreid
msg: So I think I've moved apr_pools.c succesfully, so now we'll build
it in it's new location, memory/unix.
The lib directory is now no longer touched during a build so I guess
the files in there (apr_pools.c and apr_signal.c) can be removed
at some point.  I haven't removed apr_pools.c as I wanted to be sure
that that the move was OK first!  Just call me yellow :)

msg: Fix the _np lock define for beos...

author: dreid
msg: Constify the data in the sms cleanups.

author: dreid
msg: Move the thread registration functions from the apr_sms header into
the portable header as this seems a more logical place for them given they
use apr_os_thread_t.  This also simplify's the build process ordering
BTW, do we still need to add the @deffunc lines as we don't seem to
have been doing in some places.  Is this a scandoc change Ben?

author: dreid
msg: Add some documentation for the os_thread functions recently added
